full_text: MATERIALS 2 skeins of Purl Soho’s Nigh DK , 100% Cashmere. Each skein is 199 yards/ 55 grams Color A: 1 skein; approximately 170 yards required Color B: 1 skein; approximately 170 yards required You’ll also need… US 6 (4 mm), 24-inch circular needles For more pretty pairings to inspire you, click here ! Samples: We used Pink Pearl + Morning Sky, Raindrop Blue + Sugar Maple, and Ocean Storm + Warm Cognac for our cowls. GAUGE 20 stitches and 31 rows = 4 inches in stockinette stitch, blocked SIZE Finished Neck Opening: approximately 18 inches circumference, comfortably stretching an additional 5 inches Finished Height from Point: 10 inches Designed by Purl Soho designer, Gianna Mueller . Click here to see even more of Gianna’s designs!
name: Ravelry: Reversible Cross-Collar Cowl pattern by Purl Soho
